ygData.subject: DELETE container?

Suppose you have resources with the following structure:

    /container
    /container/1
    /container/2
    /container/3

Now, suppose I were to issue a "DELETE /container".  Would it be acceptable
to end up at the end with "/container" still existing, but empty?

---
Seairth Jacobs
seairth@...
